column46: During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.

column9: Sword B, Tome A, Staff B

column46: Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.

column46: While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.
column49: An archer gifted with incredible aim. Each shot can eliminate a foe.

column46: When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.

column49: A lancer who pierces the enemy lines with flawless skill. Her bouncy steps presage deadly attacks.

column46: When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.

column46: When attacking with a sword, damage is calculated using average of foe's Def and Res.
column49: An alluring magic knight who rides an evil dragon. Overpowers with highly honed magic and sword skills.
Footsoldiers who take pride in their skill with a blade. They avoid enemy attacks with nimble footwork.

column46: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.
